name: 司潔妮
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1  Class orientation; Unit 7-1 Language & Literature I
Week 2  Unit 7-2 Language & Literature II
Week 3  Unit 8-1 Space & Exploration I
Week 4  Unit 8-2 Space & Exploration II
Week 5  Unit 9-1 Sports & Fitness I
Week 6  Unit 9-2 Sports & Fitness II
Week 7  Presentation-1
Week 8  Presentation-2
Week 9  Midterm assignment
Week 10  Unit 10-1 People & Opinions I
Week 11  Unit 10-2 People & Opinions II
Week 12  Unit 11-1 Cross-Cultural Viewpoints I
Week 13  Unit 11-2 Cross-Cultural Viewpoints II
Week 14  Unit 12-1 Bunisess & Economics I
Week 15  Unit 12-2 Bunisess & Economics II
Week 16  Presentation-1
Week 17  Presentation-2
Week 18  Final assignment
scorePolicy:
Joint midterm exam: 20%
Presentations: 40% (midterm 20% + final 20%)
Class participation: 40%
Bonus points: up to 5%
materials:
- Reading For The Real World 3rd ed. (Compass Publishing)
- In-class handouts and materials
